title: The Republicans who defied Trump's plan to keep the government running
shortDescription: In just over 12 hours, the U.S. government will shut down unless Congress finds a way to fund it.

title: Biden notches highest level of deportations in a decade
shortDescription: The pace of removals last year was higher than the Trump administration achieved any year, report finds.

title: No stranger to shutdowns: Trump's history with government closures
shortDescription: The federal government shut down three times during Donald Trump's first term as president, including 35-day closure that is longest in U.S. history.

title: Man charged with acting as Chinese agent in California election
shortDescription: Yaoning "Mike" Sun, who served as the campaign manager for a Southern California politician two years ago, was arrested Thursday, prosecutors said.

title: President Joe Biden to meet with Pope Francis at Vatican in January
shortDescription: Joe Biden's visit with Pope Francis will be part of a three-day trip to Italy in January, likely the last international trip of Biden's presidency.

title: 'Hell no': Democrats reject slimmed-down GOP proposal to avoid shutdown
shortDescription: House Republicans negotiated a new proposal to keep the government running through March. It still faces hurdles among right-wing lawmakers and Democrats alike.

title: Biden, Democrats leave shutdown chaos to the Republicans
shortDescription: Amid the threat of a federal government shutdown, President Joe Biden and Democrats say Republicans have only themselves to blame.

title: Fani Willis removed from Trump's election case
shortDescription: A Georgia court of appeals has voted to disqualify Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis from Donald Trump's election racketeering case.

title: What is the debt ceiling? What has Trump said about it?
shortDescription: But what is the debt ceiling? When will the US hit its debt ceiling? Here's what you need to know.

title: Trump calls for eliminating debt ceiling
shortDescription: President-elect Trump put his support on Thursday behind Congress eliminating the debt ceiling as part of its efforts to fund the U.S. government.

title: Fani Willis disqualified from Trump's election racketeering case
shortDescription: Donald Trump asked to remove Fulton County DA Fani Willis from the case because of her romantic relationship with another prosecutor.
